_header: Love is friend in mans need
Subjects: love, qualities of; love, virtues of
_description: Characteristics of divine love, in an English prose passage within a Latin prose sermon — four couplets

WorcF126.First Lines:
lloue ys frend in mannes nedelloue ys a blysfol
                    wede…
WorcF126.Last Lines:
…lloue ys rychest of all þyngoff all vertinius[?] lof ys
                    kyng
